channel.title: CastleWars Help
channel.description:
So I am going to take on the challange of creating castlewars myself, unless someone has some codes for it somewhere hehe. And her is what I'm confused with so far.
Players to keep there stuff when they die and get teleported back to the start
Make it so that you can't un-equip the flag
Getting to the flags
Score
When score = 3, game over, and everyone in castle wars gets teleported out
Winning team (Winners/losers are based on cape) gets a prize ( I know how to do the prize, but how do I determine the winning/losing team )
If anyone could help, that would be great. -Linksbro

item.title: CastleWars Help
item.dc:creator: @Linksbro Linksbro
item.description:
